snippet: President Bashar al-Assad lashed out at the Arab League for isolating Syria, and vowed to subdue what he cast as a foreign-backed plot against the country.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad in Beirut and a New York Times reporter in Damascus contributed to this report.

lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad lashed out at the Arab League for isolating Syria, and vowed to subdue what he cast as a foreign-backed plot against the country.

headline.seo: President Bashar al-Assad Vows to Crush ‘Conspiracy’ Against Syria
headline.main: Syrian Leader Vows ‘Iron Fist’ to Crush ‘Conspiracy’
headline.print_headline: Lashing Out at Arab League, Assad Vows to Crush ‘Conspiracy’ Against Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
